original_text: As silver is melted in a furnace, so you shall be melted in the midst of it, and you shall know that I am the Lord; I have poured out my wrath upon you.”
korean_text: 은이 풀무 불 가운데에서 녹는 것 같이 너희가 그 가운데에서 녹으리니 나 여호와가 분노를 너희 위에 쏟은 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: As silver is melted in a furnace
so you shall be melted in the midst of it
and you shall know that I am the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희는 내가 여호와인 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: I have poured out my wrath upon you
